Description.Name: Mad Cat III
Description.Details: With the success of the Mad Cat Mk II design Clan Diamond Shark developed the Mad Cat III as a medium 'Mech to accompany the heavy Mad Cat and assault Mad Cat II. Intended for sale to both Inner Sphere and Clan customers, it has been shunned by the Clans save for the Nova Cats and Exiled Wolves. However, it has proven popular with the Successor States and the Republic of the Sphere. With its top speed of 97 km/h, the Mad Cat III can quickly close with enemies to bring its short-range armament to bear. The MC III 2 switches out the MC III 1's two LRM racks for four SRM6 racks, swaps the ER Micro Lasers for Micro Pulse Lasers, and changes the two ER Medium Lasers into one Medium Pulse Laser in each arm making it a devastating close range fighter. The cooling is also somewhat improved with 14 Double Heat Sinks. The MC III 2 continues to make use of weight-saving technologies in the form of an XL Engine, Ferro Fibrous Armor, and an Endo-Composite structure.
